red: #ff0000,
yellow: #ffff00,
black: #000000,
blue: #0000FF,
green: #00ff00,
purple: #800080,
silver: #c0c0c0,
white: #ffffff,

dark-turquoise: #23cddc,

tan: #eacea7,
violet: #EE82EE,
pink: #FFC0CB,
grey: #808080
settings.info: Items separate with comma. Write color name from product option and separate option with color HEX value. All texts in lowercase.

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: [Where do I find my MailChimp form action URL?](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/theme-newsletter#add-a-mailchimp-newsletter-form-to-your-store-non-sectioned-themes-specific)

settings.content: After close popup next show will be after 1 minute. If set "DON'T SHOW THIS POPUP AGAIN" next show will be after 7 days.

settings.label: Background Image
settings.info: Image must be jpg

settings.label: Description
settings.default:
Give us your email and you will be daily updated with
the latest events, in detail!

settings.content: "MailChimp form action URL" You can find in tab "Newsletter"

settings.label: Delay before current show
settings.info: Time in milliseconds. Integer

settings.label: Delay before next show
settings.info: Time in minutes. Integer

settings.label: Empty Cart Image
settings.info: Image must be PNG

settings.label: Heading Description
settings.default: Enter your destination to get a shipping estimate.

options.value: Congo, The Democratic Republic Of The
options.label: Congo, The Democratic Republic Of The

options.value: South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands
options.label: South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.
Information about shipping info place in "shipping-calculator.liquid" (INFORMATION BLOK).
Explain to your customers what happens at checkout [Click here](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/show-multiple-currencies#explain-to-your-customers-what-happens-at-checkout).
Write ISO 4217 Currency Codes [Click here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Your currencies name: icon [Click here](http://character-code.com/currency-html-codes.php), text.

settings.label: Currencies you wish to support
settings.default: USD, ($) US Dollars | EUR, (€) Euro | GBP, (£) British Pounds
settings.info: Example: USD, ($) US Dollars | EUR, (€) Euro | GBP, (£) British Pounds
